column6: The opposing forces in Rykers finally explode, in an all-out war. It's the riot in Rykers, and Matt Murdock will find himself caught between his enemies and a hard place. Will this violent take-over prevent Matt from finding the answers he seeks about Foggy's murder, and about who's been manipulating him from the outside? And what the hell is Punisher doing here?
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):David Finch | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | penciller:Michael Lark | letterer:Cory Petit
